articles.title: ‘Rugrats’ Natalie Morales Reveals Her Character Is Gay In Paramount+ Reboot - Deadline

articles.title: Ariana Grande shares photos from her wedding at home - CNN
articles.description: Ariana Grande has shared a glimpse into her intimate wedding to real estate agent Dalton Gomez earlier this month.
